mapper.insert: insert into qna(id, member_id, product_id, option_id, category, title, message, write_date, password) values(#{id}, #{memberId}, #{productId}, #{optionId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{message}, #{writeDate}, #{password})
mapper.select: select id, member_id, product_id, option_id, category, title, message, write_date, password from qna order by id desc limit #{firstRow}, #{qnaCountPerPage}
select id, member_id, product_id, option_id, category, title, message, write_date, password from qna where id=#{id}
